normalized: every muscle in my body had been torn, like stretching gum to its limits.
my limbs convulsed abnormally, and my skin, which should have been covered by armor, was tearing.

name: asagi
normalized: uguu, uu--
my body didn't respond even when i tried to restrain the trembling in my limbs.
my joints raised shrieks as my muscle tissue and bones from beneath my tearing skin were beginning to show.
every pore throughout my body opened up as my skin continued to tear and sweat and blood trickled out.
it seemed as if my body couldn't handle the transfiguration.
nevertheless, my enormous spirit from the depths of my body flooded out and controlled the weak points.

name: asagi
normalized: ah, ahuu…, uguguu!
i gritted my teeth and tried to withstand it, but i couldn't prevent my body from collapsing.
my muscles tore to shreds as i fell.
everything was painted a deep red before my eyes before everything instantly went black.
i repeatedly convulsed and twitched.
but that too gradually weakened.
oboro's clone, carrying her wounds, slumped down where i had fallen.
her bleeding was quite severe.
her head began tottering as she was unable to stop the profuse bleeding.
but, she was first and foremost a woman who makes mockeries of people.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: shit…, bitch doesn't know when to give up, does she…
for all that, she still managed to crack a smile seeing asagi lying motionless.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: too bad for you, you weren't able to finish this, you were so close, huh
she didn't respond to her scornful words.
she wasn't dead, but it looked as if she had completely fainted.
and it wasn't just asagi that had collapsed, but sakura as well.
there was no one remaining that wasn't hurt in the plaza.
only oboro's clone, who was just barely hanging on to her consciousness.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: at any rate, that form…, don't tell me that she awoke some kind of ninja gene by herself!?
no doubt.
well, it was due to a little work on my part so that it was easier to wake, but…

name: oboro's clone
normalized: wha--
she had assumed they were alone.
but, when she looked over her shoulder, she definitely saw a man standing there.
it finally awakened…, although i wanted it to awaken a little sooner

name: oboro's clone
normalized: you are a taimanin!
her hate shifted to that taimanin.
it was her first time meeting kurou, but she recognized a taimanin when she saw it.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: how long have you…, don't tell me the taimanin are charging in on this island!?

name: kurou
normalized: normally, you would seem to think that.
at least the chinese union bunch would fall for it…
oboro's clone sensed an indistinct uneasiness.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: …you…who are you!?

name: kurou
normalized: you said i was a taimanin, didn't you?

name: oboro's clone
normalized: don't screw with me!

name: kurou
normalized: about now, american special forces disguised as taimanin should be attacking various places.
after we withdraw, it should spell the end for the real taimanin

name: oboro's clone
normalized: for real?
well, what are you?

name: kurou
normalized: …are you sure you want to know?
shivers went up her spine the moment kurou smiled at that.
he had an eerie presence that had a frightening nature about him.
then, she recognized that unearthly feeling from her original's memories.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: kuu…
as it was vague, his true character wasn't clear.
she only knew she had to escape, and thus, began crawling across the ground on instinct.
her wounds were profound, but she still tried to drag herself away from that horrible man.
hey, you trying to escape?
how pathetic

name: oboro's clone
normalized: wha--
astonishment and terror crept through oboro's clone as she sensed another presence.
well, i understand why you would run away.
you didn't make a mistake but, with those wounds, did you think you would be able to get away?
as the woman pointed out, escaping with a body that won't stand straight was short of hopeless

name: oboro's clone
normalized: no way…, you should be dead!
while oboro's clone looked in terror, her original was smiling calmly.

name: oboro
normalized: yes, i did die.
i died, but i came back to life
a sharp dogtooth poked out from her broad grin.

name: oboro
normalized: fufufu…, and thanks to you i cannot sunbathe anymore

name: oboro's clone
normalized: no way, you're a vampire…!?

name: oboro
normalized: yes way!
gashi!
the original's fist slammed into the wounds that asagi had created.
oboro's clone couldn't even raise a scream from the sharp pain that had traveled through her.

name: oboro
normalized: fufufu…, have a little sleep, huh
oboro's clone's body collapsed onto the plaza ground.
the man peered into asagi's senseless face.

name: kurou
normalized: it looks like she's still alive
blood was gushing out from countless lacerations, but it looked as if her heart were still faintly beating.
oboro timidly approached kurou.

name: oboro
normalized: even if i do say so myself, this woman is too dangerous to let her live.
--mr.
edwin black
the person who she had referred to as edwin black, quietly shrugged off her opinion.

name: kurou
normalized: no, these women still have value… asagi, sakura, and that clone, bring them

name: kurou
normalized: are you unhappy about something?

name: oboro
normalized: no…, as you wish
oboro, accepting a true fatherly kiss, bowed her head respectfully without saying any more than that.

name: kurou
normalized: that's better--
kurou floated a cold-hearted smile as he said that.
